name: REDSTORY and the Last Glimmer
description:
REDSTORY and the Last Glimmer is above all a story.



In this original creation inspired by Charles Perrault's tale "Little Red Riding Hood", RED is accompanied by her friend Birdy, a little bird, in the fictional world of the 6 Kingdoms. It's a complex imaginary world with different types of creatures and landscapes: the Black Forest invaded by giant spiders, caves... On foot, on the back of a bumblebee, or even in a wagon hurtling down a snowy mountain at full speed, Red and Birdy will go beyond the forest, cross a frozen world and the depths of a volcano, meet fairies, trolls, and much more fantastic still... In order to save his grandmother, Red will have to show courage and surpass herself. Through hardships, she will eventually discover her own story. This extraordinary adventure will make children and parents discover that even when you are small, from the top of your small shoulders, you can accomplish extraordinary things.
